channel.title: Vincent Codes Finance
channel.description: A blog about coding for empirical research in finance

item.title: New Year, new blog
item.dc:creator: Vincent Grégoire, PhD, CFA
item.description: Happy New Year and welcome to the first post of Vincent Codes Finance! As we step into a fresh year, I’m thrilled to launch this new blog and YouTube channel dedicated to Python and coding in empirical finance research. I’m excited to share my knowledge and experience with you.
